anya-e0905n3:2_0: Pucchā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṁ āvuso porāṇakehi saṁgītikāramahātherehi kaṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgītaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:3_0: Vissajjanā – ubhato vibhaṅgānantaraṁ bhante porāṇakehi saṁgītikāramahātherehi khandhakā saṁgītā.
anya-e0905n3:4_0: Pucchā – te pana āvuso khandhakā vaggabhedena katividhā.
anya-e0905n3:5_0: Vissajjanā – te pana bhante khandhakā duvidhā vaggabhedena mahāvaggo cūḷavaggoti.
anya-e0905n3:6_0: Pucchā – mahāvagge āvuso kati khandhakā pariyāpannā.
anya-e0905n3:7_0: Vissajjanā – mahāvagge bhante dasakhandhakā pariyāpannā, seyyathidaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:7_1: mahākhandhako uposathakkhandhako vassūpanāyikakkhandhako pavāraṇākkhandhako cammakkhandhako bhesajjakkhandhako kathinakkhandhako cīvarakkhandhako campeyyakkhandhako kosambakakkhandhakoti.
anya-e0905n3:8_0: Pucchā – mahākhandhake āvuso bahū kathāyo, katamā tāsaṁ ādikathā.
anya-e0905n3:12_0: Pucchā – tasmātiha āvuso tato paṭṭhāya taṁ pucchissāmi,
anya-e0905n3:12_1: bhagavā āvuso paṭhamābhisambuddhakāle kattha kīvacīraṁ kenākārena vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:13_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante paṭhamābhisambuddho bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena vihāsi vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedī.
anya-e0905n3:14_0: Pucchā – tadā āvuso bhagavā kīdisaṁ dhammaṁ manasikatvā kīdisaṁ udānaṁ udānesi.
anya-e0905n3:15_0: Vissajjanā – tadā bhante bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomaṁ paṭilomaṁ manasikatvā tīṇi udānāni udānesi.
anya-e0905n3:17_0: Pucchā – tassa āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:18_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā ajapāla nigrodhamūle vihāsi,
anya-e0905n3:20_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:21_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā mucalindamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
anya-e0905n3:22_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:23_0: Vissajjanā – tassapi bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedī.
anya-e0905n3:24_0: Pucchā – tassapi āvuso sattāhassa accayena bhagavā kattha vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:25_0: Vissajjanā – tassa bhante sattāhassa accayena bhagavā punadeva ajapālanigrodhamūle vihāsi.
anya-e0905n3:26_0: Pucchā – tasmiṁ pana āvuso ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato kathaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n3:27_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṁ pana bhante ajapālanigrodhe viharantassa bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa dhammagambhīratāpaṭisaṁyutto cetaso parivitakko udapādi.
anya-e0905n3:28_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso aranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacarā nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
anya-e0905n3:31_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tadā dhammadesanāya brahmayācanā ca bhagavato paṭiññāca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:32_0: Vissajjanā – desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ, desetu sugato dhammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:32_1: santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti,
anya-e0905n3:32_2: bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāroti iti bhante brahmuno dhammadesanāya yācanā ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:37_0: Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavato dhammadesanāya paṭiññā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:42_0: Pucchā – evaṁ kho āvuso bhagavā dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṁ katvā paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ desento kattha kīdisaṁ dhammaṁ kassa desesi.
anya-e0905n3:43_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiya bhikkhupamukhānaṁ brahmagaṇānaṁ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṁ desesi.
anya-e0905n3:44_0: Pucchā – tasmiṁ kho pana āvuso dhammacakkapavattanasutte desiyamāne manussaloke kassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:45_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmato bhante koṇḍaññassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:46_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ nu kho āvuso imasmiṁ buddhasāsane paṭhamaṁ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:47_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṁ bhante buddhasāsane paṭhamaṁ ehibhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:48_0: Labheyyāhaṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:50_0: Pucchā – itaresaṁ pana āvuso catunnaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ kadā dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:51_0: Vissajjanā – pāṭipade bhante divase āyasmato vappassa,
anya-e0905n3:51_3: catutthe bhante divase āyasmato assajissa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:52_0: Pucchā – sabbesampi āvuso tesaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kadā arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n3:53_0: Vissajjanā – sabbesampi bhante tesaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pakkhassa pañcamiyaṁ anattalakkhaṇasutte desiyamāne arahattapatti hoti.
anya-e0905n3:54_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n3:55_0: Vissajjanā – yasappamukhānaṁ bhante catupaññāsa sahāyakānaṁ pabbajitakāle bhagavatā bhikkhū tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitā.
anya-e0905n3:57_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjūpa sampadā anuññāto ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:58_0: Vissajjanā – yasappamukhānaṁ bhante catupaññāsāya gihi sahāyakānaṁ pabbajitvā tattha tattha cārikaṁ caritvā dhammadesanatthāya pesitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:59_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
anya-e0905n3:60_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ ārāmo paṭiggaṇhituṁ kattha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:61_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante bhikkhūnaṁ ārāmaṁ paṭiggaṇhituṁ rājagahe anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:61_1: rājā bhante māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa veḷuvanaṁ uyyānaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n3:62_0: Etāhaṁ bhante veḷuvanaṁ uyyānaṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi –
anya-e0905n3:64_0: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso dvinnaṁ aggasāvakānaṁ pabbajjūpasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:65_0: Vissajjanā – dvinnaṁ bhante aggasāvakānaṁ ehi bhikkhupasampadā ahosi.
anya-e0905n3:72_0: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṁ hetuṁ tathāgato;
anya-e0905n3:73_0: Āha tesañca yo nirodho, evaṁ vādī mahāsamaṇo.
anya-e0905n3:75_0: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṁ me sāvakayugaṁ bhavissati aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:76_0: Labheyyāma mayaṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ labheyyāma upasampadaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:78_0: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:79_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:79_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:80_0: Pucchā – upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:81_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:81_1: sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:82_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:83_0: Vissajjanā – rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:84_0: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarati.
anya-e0905n3:85_0: Ahaṁ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarāmi.
anya-e0905n3:88_0: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṁ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
anya-e0905n3:90_0: Pucchā – ayācitakaṁ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṁ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:91_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:91_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṁ anācāraṁ acari,
anya-e0905n3:92_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso nissayānaṁ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:93_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:93_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji,
anya-e0905n3:95_0: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
anya-e0905n3:96_0: Pucchā – ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:97_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ upasenaṁ vaṅgantaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:97_1: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṁ upasampādesi,
anya-e0905n3:98_0: Pucchā – bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:99_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:99_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ‘‘dasavassamhā dasavassamhā’’ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:100_0: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:101_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto,
anya-e0905n3:101_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:102_0: Pucchā – pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:103_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:103_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ pabbājesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:104_0: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṁ na pabbājeyyuṁ…
anya-e0905n3:105_0: Pucchā – rājabhaṭaṁ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:106_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:107_0: Pucchā – dhajabandhaṁ āvuso coraṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:108_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṁ coraṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:108_1: aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n3:109_0: Pucchā – kārabhedakaṁ āvuso coraṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:110_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:111_0: Pucchā – iṇāyikaṁ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:112_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:113_0: Pucchā – dāsaṁ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:114_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:115_0: Pucchā – bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:116_0: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṁ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto mātāpitūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti,
anya-e0905n3:117_0: Pucchā – ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:118_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:118_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṁ puggalaṁ upasampādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:119_0: Na bhikkhave jānaṁ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
anya-e0905n3:120_0: Pucchā – mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṁ puttaṁ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:121_1: rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā varaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:121_2: sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṁ mātāpitūhi puttaṁ pabbājeyyunti,
anya-e0905n3:122_0: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
anya-e0905n3:123_0: Pucchā – theyyasaṁvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:124_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ purāṇakulaputtaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:124_1: aññataro bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvasi,
anya-e0905n3:125_0: Pucchā – tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:126_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ nāgaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:126_1: aññataro bhante nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:127_0: Pucchā – mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:128_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante aññataraṁ māṇavakaṁ ārabbha paṭikkhittā,
anya-e0905n3:128_1: aññataro ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṁ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṁ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n3:129_0: Mātughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo,
anya-e0905n3:129_1: pitughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo.
anya-e0905n3:130_0: Pucchā – apattacīvarakaṁ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṁ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:131_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:135_0: Pucchā – cātuddase ca āvuso pannarase ca pakkhassa ca aṭṭhamiyā sannipatitvā dhammaṁ bhāsituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:136_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:136_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū cātuddesa pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatitvā tuṇhī nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:137_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa sannipatituṁ.
anya-e0905n3:139_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhuddeso bhagavatā anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:140_0: Vissajjanā – yadā bhante bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṁ paññattāni sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0905n3:140_2: so nesaṁ bhavissati uposathakamma’’nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhuddeso anuññāto.
anya-e0905n3:141_0: Pucchā – sīmaṁ āvuso sammanituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:142_1: rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi ‘‘bhagavatā paññattaṁ ettāvatā sāmaggī,
anya-e0905n3:143_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n3:145_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathakammāni tesu ca kīdisaṁ uposathakammaṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ, kīdisaṁ ananuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:146_5: Tatra bhante yadidaṁ adhammena vaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:146_6: adhammena samaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ dhammena vaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:146_8: tatra bhante yadidaṁ dhammena samaggaṁ uposathakammaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:150_0: Pucchā – vassūpanāyikaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:151_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:151_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:153_0: Vissajjanā – dvemā bhante vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā purimikā pacchimikā,
anya-e0905n3:153_3: imā kho bhante dve vassūpanāyikā bhagavatā anuññātā.
anya-e0905n3:154_0: Pucchā – vassaṁ āvuso upagantvā purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ avasitvā cārikaṁ pakkamantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:155_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:155_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vassaṁ upagantvā antarā vassaṁ cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:156_0: Pucchā – sattāha karaṇīyena āvuso pahite gantuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:157_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:157_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū udenena upāsakena pahite na gacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:158_0: Pucchā – sattāhakaraṇīyena āvuso sattannaṁ apahitepi gantuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:159_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātugilāna vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:160_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena apahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
anya-e0905n3:161_0: Pucchā – kismiṁci āvuso antarāye sati antovassaṁ pakkamituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:162_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:162_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:163_0: Pucchā – rukkha susire vā āvuso rukkhaviṭabhiyā vā ajjhokāse vā vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:164_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:164_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rukkhasusirepi rukkhaviṭabhiyāpi ajjhokāsepi vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:165_0: Pucchā – asenāsanikena āvuso vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:166_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṁyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṁ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:166_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:167_0: Pucchā – chavakuṭikāya vā āvuso chatte vā cāṭiyā vā vassaṁ upagacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:168_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:168_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chavakuṭikāyapi chattepi cāṭiyāpi vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:169_0: Pucchā – paṭissavaṁ āvuso visaṁ vādentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:170_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:170_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassaṁ vāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādesi,
anya-e0905n3:174_0: Pucchā – vassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ tīhi ṭhānehi pavārituṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:175_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:175_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sandiṭṭhā sambhattā antovassaṁ neva ālapiṁsu na sallapiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:176_0: Anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:176_1: diṭṭheva vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā.
anya-e0905n3:177_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso pavāraṇā divasavasena ca puggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
anya-e0905n3:179_0: Pucchā – katīnaṁ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:179_1: katīnaṁ panāvuso aññamaññaṁ pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:180_0: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ saṅghe pavāretuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:180_1: catunnaṁ vā bhante tiṇṇaṁ vā dvinnaṁ vā aññamaññaṁ pavāretuṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:181_0: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṁvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṁ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:182_0: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā ‘‘ajja me pavāraṇā’’ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:187_0: Pucchā – upāhanaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:188_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:188_1: āyasmato bhante soṇassa accāraddhavīriyassa caṅkamato pādā bhijjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:189_0: Pucchā – sabbanīlikā vā āvuso sabbapītikā vā sabbalohitikā vā sabbamañjiṭṭhikā vā sabbakaṇhā vā sabbamahāraṅgarattā vā sabbamahānāmarattā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:190_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:190_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlikāyo upāhanāyo dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:190_2: sabbapītikāyo sabbalohitikāyo sabbamañjiṭṭhikāyo sabbakaṇhāyo sabbamahāraṅgarattā sabbamahānāmarattāyopi upāhanāyo dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:191_0: Pucchā – khallakabandhā vā āvuso puṭabandhā vā pāliguṇṭhimā vā tūlapuṇṇikā vā tittirapattikā vā meṇḍavisāṇavaddhikā vā ajavisāṇavaddhikā vā vicchikāḷikā vā morapiñcha parisibbikā vā citrā vā upāhanāyo dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:192_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:192_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū khallakabandhā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:192_9: morapiñcha parisibbitā upāhanāyo dhāresuṁ, citrā upāhanāyopi dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:193_0: Pucchā – kaṭṭhapādukāyo āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:194_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggīyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:194_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya kaṭṭhapādukāyo abhiruhitvā ajjhokāse caṅkamanti uccāsaddā mahāsaddā khaṭakhaṭasaddā anekavihitaṁ tiracchānakathaṁ kathentā,
anya-e0905n3:195_0: Pucchā – yānena āvuso yāyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:196_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:197_0: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso yānaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:198_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ gilānaṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:198_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya antarāmagge gilāno kukkuccāyanto yānaṁ nābhiruhi,
anya-e0905n3:199_0: Pucchā – uccāsayanamahāsayanāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:200_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:201_0: Pucchā – gocammāni āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:202_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ pāpabhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:203_0: Pucchā – paccantimesu āvuso janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā ca guṇaṅguṇūpahanañca dhuvanahānañca cammāni attharaṇāni ca nissīmagatānaṁ cīvaradānañcāti imāni pañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:204_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ kuṭikaṇṇaṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:204_1: āyasmā bhante soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo etāni pañcavatthūni āyasmato mahākaccānassa vacanena bhagavantaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:208_0: Pucchā – pañca āvuso bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:209_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:209_1: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena puṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi na sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n3:209_2: bhattampi bhuttaṁ na sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n3:209_3: te tena kisā ahesuṁ lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā,
anya-e0905n3:210_0: Pucchā – mūlādibhesajjāni āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:211_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule gilāne bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:211_1: sambahulānaṁ gilānānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mūlehi bhesajjehi attho ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:212_0: Pucchā – antovuṭṭhaṁvā āvuso antopakkaṁ vā sāmaṁpakkaṁ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:213_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:213_1: āyasmā bhante ānando sāmaṁ tilampi taṇḍulampi muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṁ paci,
anya-e0905n3:215_0: Pucchā – manussamaṁsaṁ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṁsaṁ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:216_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:216_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṁsaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n3:217_0: Na bhikkhave manussamaṁsaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ, yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti thullaccayassa,
anya-e0905n3:217_1: na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṁsaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:218_0: Pucchā – hatthimaṁsaṁ vā āvuso assamaṁsaṁ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:219_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:219_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṁsampi assamaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:220_0: Pucchā – sunakkhamaṁsaṁ vā āvuso ahimaṁsaṁ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:221_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:221_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṁsampi ahimaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:222_0: Pucchā – sīhamaṁsaṁ vā āvuso byagghamaṁsaṁ vā dīpimaṁsaṁ vā acchamaṁsaṁ vā taracchamaṁsaṁ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:223_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:223_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sīhamaṁsampi byagghamaṁsampi dīpimaṁsampi acchamaṁsampi taracchamaṁsampi paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:224_0: Pucchā – gilānassa āvuso guḷaṁ vā agilānassa guḷodakaṁ vā bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:225_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:225_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññāto no agilānassāti kukkuccāyantā guḷaṁ na bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:226_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso uddissa kataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ paññapetvā tikoṭiparisuddhaṁ maṁsaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:227_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante sīhassa seṭāpatino vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:229_0: Pucchā – pātheyyaṁ āvuso pariyesituñca kappiyakārakānaṁ hatthe upanikkhittahiraññato nibbattaṁ kappiyapaccayaṁ sādituñca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante bhaddiyaṁ antarā ca aṅguttarāpaṁ meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_1: meṇḍako bhante gahapati bhagavantaṁ yāci ‘‘santi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:230_2: sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātheyyaṁ anujānātū’’ti,
anya-e0905n3:232_0: Pucchā – aṭṭha āvuso pānāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:233_0: Vissajjanā – āpaṇe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:233_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā pānāni na paṭiggaṇhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:235_0: Pucchā – sabbañca āvuso ḍākaṁ sabbañca piṭṭhakhādanīyaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:236_0: Vissajjanā – kusinārāyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:236_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā ḍākañca piṭṭhakhādanīyañca na paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:237_0: Pucchā – akappiyaṁ āvuso samādapentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:238_0: Vissajjanā – ātumāyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:239_0: Pucchā – saṅghikāni vā āvuso puggalikāni vā bījāni puggalikāya vā saṅghikāya vā bhūmiyā ropitāni bhāgaṁ datvā paribhuñjituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:240_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghikānipi bījāni puggalikāya bhūmiyā ropiyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:241_0: Pucchā – vinayamahāpadesasaṅkhātāni āvuso cattāri kappiyākappiyaanulomāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n3:242_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni,
anya-e0905n3:242_1: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ kismiñci kismiñciṭhāne kukkuccaṁ uppajji,
anya-e0905n3:243_0: Pucchā – yāvakālikādīhi saṁsaṭṭhānaṁ āvuso yāmakālikādīnaṁ paribhogakālamariyādaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:244_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:244_1: sambahulānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi ‘‘kappati nukho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṁ sattāhakālikaṁ yāvajīvikaṁ, na nukho kappati.
anya-e0905n3:244_2: Kappatinukho yāmakālikena sattāhakālikaṁ yāvajīvikaṁ, na nukho kappati.
anya-e0905n3:244_3: Kappati nukho sattāhakālikena yāvajīvikaṁ, na nukho kappatī’’ti.
anya-e0905n3:248_0: Pucchā – vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ kathinaṁ attharituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:249_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante tiṁsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:249_1: tiṁsamattā bhante pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṁ āgacchantā bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya nāsakkhiṁsu sāvatthiyaṁ vassūpanāyikaṁ sambhāvetuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:254_0: Pucchā – gahapaticīvaraṁ āvuso sādiyituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:255_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:255_1: jīvako bhante komārabhacco bhikkhūnaṁ gahapaticīvaraṁ anujānituṁ bhagavantaṁ yāci,
anya-e0905n3:256_0: Pucchā – cha āvuso rajanāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n3:257_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni,
anya-e0905n3:257_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū chakaṇenapi paṇḍumattikāyapi cīvaraṁ rajiṁsu, cīvaraṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ hoti,
anya-e0905n3:258_0: Pucchā – acchinnakāni āvuso cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:259_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:259_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū acchinnakāni cīvarāni dhāresuṁ dantakasāvāni,
anya-e0905n3:260_0: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ chinnakaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ chinnakaṁ antaravāsakaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:261_0: Vissajjanā – dakkhiṇāgirito bhante pacchāgatakāle bhagavā anuññāsi chinnakaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ chinnakaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ chinnakaṁ antaravāsakaṁ.
anya-e0905n3:262_0: Pucchā – aggaḷaṁ ca āvuso tunnañca ovaṭṭikañca kaṇḍusakañca daḷhīkammañca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:263_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:264_0: Pucchā – vassikasāṭikā ca āvuso āgantukabhattañca gamikabhattañca gilānabhattañca gilānupaṭṭhākabhattañca gilānabhesajjañca dhuvayāgu ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭikācāti imā aṭṭha bhagavatā kattha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:265_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ ārabbha anuññātā,
anya-e0905n3:265_1: visākhā bhante migāramātā bhagavantaṁ aṭṭhavarāni yāci,
anya-e0905n3:266_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso mātāpitūnaṁ dānaṁ anujānitvā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:267_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:267_1: aññatarassa bhante bhikkhuno bahuṁ cīvaraṁ uppannaṁ ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:267_2: so ca taṁcīvaraṁ mātāpitūnaṁ dātukāmo ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:268_0: Mātāpitaroti kho bhikkhave dadamāne kiṁ vadeyyāma,
anya-e0905n3:269_0: Pucchā – aññatra vassaṁ vuṭṭhena āvuso aññatra cīvarabhāgaṁ sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:270_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:270_1: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto aññatra vassaṁ vuṭṭho aññatra cīvarabhāgaṁ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n3:271_0: Pucchā – anāthakaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ gilānaṁ na upaṭṭhahantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:272_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:272_1: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṁ viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno kucchivikārābādho ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:273_0: Pucchā – naggiyaṁ āvuso titthiyasamādānaṁ samādiyantassa thullaccayaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:274_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:274_1: aññataro bhante bhikkhu naggiyaṁ titthiyasamādānaṁ samādiyi,
anya-e0905n3:275_0: Pucchā – sabbanīlakāni vā āvuso cīvarāni sabbapītakāni vā sabbalohitakāni vā sabbamañjiṭṭhakāni vā sabbakaṇhānivāti evarūpāni cīvarāni dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:276_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:276_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sabbanīlakādīni cīvarāni dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:277_0: Pucchā – kañcukaṁ vā āvuso veṭhanaṁ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:278_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:278_1: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kañcukampi dhāresuṁ veṭhanampi dhāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n3:282_0: Pucchā – suddhaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:283_0: Vissajjanā – campāyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:283_1: bhagavati bhante campāyaṁ viharati sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu vāsabhagāme suddhaṁ kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:287_0: Pucchā – bhedagarukehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabboti ca,
anya-e0905n3:287_1: bhedagarukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā paresampi saddhāya āpattidesetabbāti ca āvuso ayaṁ sāmaggirasaovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno,
anya-e0905n3:288_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha dinno,
anya-e0905n3:288_1: bhagavati bhante kosambiyaṁ viharati aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpanno ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_2: so tassā āpattiyā āpatti diṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_3: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā anāpatti diṭṭhino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0905n3:288_4: So aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
anya-e0905n3:288_5: aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0905n3:288_6: Atha kho te bhante bhikkhū sāmaggiṁ labhitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu,
anya-e0905n3:289_0: Pucchā – saṅghabhedassa āvuso mūlabhūte bhikkhumhi ukkhittake osārite tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiñca kātuṁ sāmaggī uposathañca kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante teyeva ukkhittakānuvattake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_1: te bhante ukkhittakānuvattakā bhikkhū taṁ ukkhittakaṁ bhikkhuṁ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṁsu upasaṅkamitvā te ukkhepake bhikkhū ekadavocuṁ ‘‘yasmiṁ āvuso vatthusmiṁ ahosi saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṅghabhedo saṅgharāji saṅghavavatthānaṁ saṅghanānākaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0905n3:290_2: so eso bhikkhuṁ āpanno ca ukkhitto ca passi ca osārito ca,
anya-e0905n3:290_3: handa mayaṁ āvuso tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṁ karomā’’ti,
